description.narrative: Halve the proportion of population without access to sustainable and safe drinking water in target districts by 2015, which contributes to Sanitation, Wash â€“ General, Water. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Children, mothers and pregnant women benefit from high impact interventions contributing to the attainment of MDG targets for child and maternal survival and development.
